commands.name: Mute
commands.description: Makes it so the member can't talk in chat or vc.

commands.name: Unmute
commands.description: Unmuted a previously muted user.

commands.name: Tempmute
commands.description: Muted a user for a specific amount of time. Use s, m, h, d after number to set the time.

commands.name: Kick
commands.description: Kicks a user from the server.

commands.name: Ban
commands.description: Bans a user from the server.

commands.name: Unban
commands.description: Unbans a previously banned user from the server. Can use user's name#discriminator.

commands.name: Purge
commands.description: Mass deletes messages.

commands.name: Addrole
commands.description: Adds a server role to a user.

commands.name: Removerole
commands.description: Removes a server role from a user.

commands.name: Createmuted
commands.description: Creates a server role named Muted and edits all the channel perms so the role can't chat there. Used for mute command.

commands.name: Lock
commands.description: Locks the current channel the command was ran in and changes everyone permission to not talk.

commands.name: Unlock
commands.description: Unlocks the current channel the command was ran in and changes everyone permission to talk.

commands.name: Nuke
commands.description: Replaces channel with exact copy. Useful for clearing all messages in a channel.

commands.name: Say
commands.description: Make the bot say something.

commands.name: Embed
commands.description: Make the bot say something in an embed.

commands.name: Remindme
commands.description: Make the bot ping you and remind you of something after a certain amount of time. Use s, m, h, d after number to set the time.

commands.name: 8ball
commands.description: Ask the bot a question and he will decide your fate.

commands.name: Members
commands.description: View the member count of the server.

commands.name: Pp
commands.description: View how large your pp is.

commands.name: Gstart
commands.description: Start a giveaway. Use s, m, h, d after number to set the time.

commands.name: Greroll
commands.description: Reroll a previously ended giveaway. The id is the message id.

commands.name: Avatar
commands.description: View the avatar of a user. Will give you options for jpg, png and webp.

commands.name: Suggestion
commands.description: Suggest something for the server. Must have a suggestion channel set.

commands.name: Botinfo
commands.description: Check some info about the bot.

commands.name: Ping
commands.description: Check the bot's connection to discord.

commands.name: Invite
commands.description: Get a link to invite the bot to your server.

commands.name: Discord
commands.description: Get a link to the bot support server.

commands.name: Changeprefix
commands.description: Change the bot's prefix in your server.

commands.name: Suggestion
commands.description: Suggest something! Will only work if a suggestion channel is set.

commands.name: Bug Report
commands.description: Report a bug. Thanks for improving the bot!

commands.name: Vote
commands.description: Get links to vote for the bot.

commands.name: Faq
commands.description: Get Answers to the most frequently asked questions about the bot.

commands.name: Website
commands.description: Get the link to the bot's website.

commands.name: Kill
commands.description: Kill a user.

commands.name: Revive
commands.description: Revive a user.

commands.name: Hug
commands.description: Hug a user.

commands.name: Kiss
commands.description: Kiss a user.

commands.name: Slap
commands.description: Slap a user.

commands.name: Kick
commands.description: Kick a user (not from the server).

commands.name: Wave
commands.description: Wave to a user.

commands.name: Dog
commands.description: Get a random dog gif.

commands.name: Cat
commands.description: Get a random cat gif.

commands.name: Panda
commands.description: Get a random panda gif

commands.name: Fox
commands.description: Get a random fox gif.

commands.name: Gay
commands.description: Make someone's profile picture rainbow colors.

commands.name: Glass
commands.description: Add a glass overlay to someone's profile picture.

commands.name: Wasted
commands.description: Add the wasted overlay from gta to someone's profile picture.

commands.name: Comment
commands.description: Generate a youtube comment. The user you mention is the profile picture, name you input is the youtube channel name and text is the comment.

commands.name: Gif
commands.description: Search for a gif on giphy. If you don't search anything it will output a random gif.

commands.name: Config
commands.description: View what your config is set to for the server.

commands.name: Config Message
commands.description: View configurable options for messages.

commands.name: Config Channel
commands.description: View configurable options for channels.

commands.name: Config Enable
commands.description: View configurable options for enabling features.

commands.name: Config Disable
commands.description: View configurable options for disabling features.

commands.name: Config Joinrole
commands.description: View configurable options for roles that are automatically given on member join.
